text: Na tondũ nĩ kwarĩ na andũ aingĩ kĩrĩndĩ-inĩ kĩu mateetheretie-rĩ, Alawii nĩo maaheirwo wĩra wa gũthĩnja nginya tũtũrũme twa Bathaka twa andũ acio othe maarĩ na thaahu, tondũ matingĩamũrĩire Jehova tũtũrũme twao.30:17 Kũringana na watho andũ arĩa maarĩ atongoria a nyũmba nĩo maathĩnjaga gatũrũme ka Bathaka.
